text: Mafioso may refer to: * Mafioso is a member of a mafia organization, who can be a mobster or "made man," usually more specifically a member of the Sicilian Mafia, Italian-American Mafia, or other Italian criminal organizations. * Mafioso (film), a 1962 Italian black comedy film * Mafioso rap, a hip hop music subgenre of gangsta rap ==See also== * Mafia (disambiguation)
title: Mafioso
